| HistoryText             = Counter Force was a team composed of former members of the [[New Warriors (Earth-616)|New Warriors]]. The purpose of the team was to monitor the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|Initiative]] to ensure they stayed true to their goal of training new and undeveloped superhumans. Their roster included [[Vance Astrovik (Earth-616)|Justice]], [[Elvin Haliday (Earth-616)|Rage]], [[Steven Harmon (Earth-616)|Slapstick]], and [[Deborah Fields (Earth-616)|Debrii]]. After the defeat of KIA, the surviving Scarlet Spiders, along with the [[Michael van Patrick (Clone) (Earth-616)|MVP clone]] and the real MVP's father [[Brian van Patrick (Earth-616)|Brian van Patrick]], joined with Justice and some former New Warriors who were Initiative trainees as a Counter Force of underground registered heroes.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #12}}

They later teamed up with the then current team of [[New Warriors (Earth-616)|New Warriors]] on a mission to recover the bodies of the original Night Thrasher, Microbe and Namorita during the [[Secret Invasion|Skrull Invasion]].
